amendment.description: To make additional corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 34.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5137 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5137 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S6696-6697; text: CR S6696) To make additional corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 34.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5137 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
